Articles.Content: I stumbled across this while looking at stuff unrelated to KSP, but I thought some here might enjoy it.

I think there is something coded in our instinctive behavior that compels us to always move into new areas.

Probably part of a survival drive that we all have to some extent.

I think there is something coded in our instinctive behavior that compels us to always move into new areas.

Certainly there are some among us who are compelled to explore while others are content to stay close to home. It makes sense that its a survival mechanism.

I shared the clip because I liked the cinematography and the juxtaposition of the images and Buzz Aldrin talking about our need/desire to explore.
